column4: hey, got a quick question.... got all these fsck0000.rec, fsck0001.rec files (and so on) on one of my drives, does that mean that a ton of my files are now missing these pieces? a lot of video clips i notice... =\ this could be bad if so...
fsck ran and errored out once after crash...
frogzoo: um, not really the case, ubuntu crashed on me several times, nothing i could do about it, but thanx...
check disk for bed sectors...maybe bad
